GSD.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v5.10.159
GSD.description:
net: hisilicon: Fix potential use-after-free in hix5hd2_rx()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.159 by commit 93aaa4bb72e388f6a4887541fd3d18b84f1b5ddc, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit 57c5bc9ad7d799e9507ba6e993398d2c55f03fab. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: hisilicon: Fix potential use-after-free in hix5hd2_rx()
